Items.desc: You and Anson are going to explore the forest
You and Anson got into the forest ,continue to explore
There are some strange traces on the floor, what could that be...?
You found a giant monster! You can't leave it alone as it may destroy the village!
Items.instruction: Heads to the final area of Emerald Forest and defeat the boss.

Items.desc: You and Anson decided to leave the village and go out to explore. The first destination would be Falone City.
Heads to Falone City
Simon the knight joined the party. The party then accepted a quest from Conrad to defeat the ogre in the Great Plain.
Items.instruction: Prepare supply and explore The Great Plain (Choose Progressive Mode).
Continue to explore The Great Plain.

Items.desc: The party is heading close to the ogre's cave
Items.instruction: Continue to explore The Great Plain.
Continue to explore The Great Plain.

Items.desc: You guys found the ogre! Defeat it!
Items.instruction: Heads to the final area of The Great Plain and defeat the boss.

Items.desc: The party got a good relax after defeating the ogre, now you guys accepted a new quest : to help deal with the pollution in Magical Forest
The party reached Magical Forest
Items.instruction: Heads to Magical Forest Research Camp

Items.desc: Ivan joined the party. The party is heading into the forest to found out the source of the pollution
The party discovered that a Green Dragon could be the source of the pollution. You guys decided to heads to deep into the forest to defeat the dragon.
The party found Green Dragon's cave.
Items.instruction: Heads to the final area of Magical Forest and defeat the boss.

Items.desc: The party successfully defeated the dragon. Ivan suggested to go to the Southern Islands as there are said to be attacked by a large sea monster.
After a long journey the party has arrived the Southern Islands
Jimmy joined the party.
The party found the true identity sea monster.It's a Hydra.
Items.instruction: Heads to the final area of Southern Islands and defeat the boss.

Items.desc: Conrad was missing! The last place he was spotted was heading to Oakville. Since the road to Oakville was blocked due to an earthquake, the only way to get there is to through a cave system.
Ivan seems to see someone. Continue to chase him.
Andy the Necromancer joined the team. He said that he can help the party to find the exit
Andy said the the Minotaur is trapping people inside the cave, one cannot leave the cave unless defeat it.
The party found Minotaur. It's time to defeat it!
Items.instruction: Heads to the final area of Crystal Cave and defeat the boss.

Items.desc: The party defeated Minotaur and found the cave exit.
The once beautiful ville is now filled with undeads, what happened?
It seems like the villager and the knights are killed by dark magic.
Conrad seems to have been mind-controlled. Defeat him
Items.instruction: Heads to the final area of Haunted Wood and defeat the boss.

Items.desc: After buried Conrad, the party decided to continue chase Matius
The party met Chi Ka and Katie inside a cave. They agree to go with the party. But first they want to go back to the city and prepare
After some relax, the team again headed out to the desert to chase Matius.
The team finally arrived The ruin of Anzor
The party found Matius, it's time to take revenage!
Items.instruction: Heads to the final area of Buring Desert and defeat the boss.

Items.desc: The party defeated Fossil Dragon, but Matius has once again escaped.The patry decided to follow him to Vulkan Volcano
